channel.title: Friends not able to connect to my server
channel.description: Hello, me and my friend have ran into a bit of a problem with TrisidiaX's source and after a bunch of Google searching and time consuming we got it to run and it works fine for me to connect but when my friend tries to connect to it, it gives him the error of "Error connecting to server" and we have spent a long time trying to figure this out. I do have No-Ip installed and the ports for RSPS open but it just wont budge. I even attempted to connect to it using my brothers computer on the same internet with both my IP and Hamachi and it still doesn't work. Client.java and GUI.java do have the IP plugged in for my friends and my brothers. Hope to get some feedback soon, thanks.

item.title: Friends not able to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Space_zG Space zG
item.description:
@Space_zG wrote:

I do have both on both computers. My skype is lashedspace677.

item.title: Friends not able to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @rmark45matsu rmark45matsu
item.description:
@rmark45matsu wrote:

On your brothers computer, use the local network ID of the computer hosting it, not through no-ip. Should start with like 192.168.1.xxx

item.title: Friends not able to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Space_zG Space zG
item.description:
@Space_zG wrote:

Hello, me and my friend have ran into a bit of a problem with TrisidiaX’s source and after a bunch of Google searching and time consuming we got it to run and it works fine for me to connect but when my friend tries to connect to it, it gives him the error of “Error connecting to server” and we have spent a long time trying to figure this out. I do have No-Ip installed and the ports for RSPS open but it just wont budge. I even attempted to connect to it using my brothers computer on the same internet with both my IP and Hamachi and it still doesn’t work. Client.java and GUI.java do have the IP plugged in for my friends and my brothers. Hope to get some feedback soon, thanks.
